statements: SELECT * FROM blocks
SELECT block_id, timestamp FROM blocks WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01'
SELECT block_id, transactions FROM blocks WHERE block_id ='abc-123'
SELECT * FROM blocks ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT block_id FROM blocks WHERE block_id IN ('123-abc', '456-def', '789-hij')
SELECT * FROM blocks WHERE timestamp > NOW() - interval '1 day' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT block_id, timestamp FROM blocks WHERE jsonb_array_length(transactions) > 2 ORDER BY block_id ASC
SELECT block_id, jsonb_pretty(transactions) FROM blocks WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-12-31 23:59:59' LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5
SELECT block_id, COUNT(*) AS num_transactions FROM blocks GROUP BY block_id HAVING num_transactions > 5 ORDER BY num_transactions DESC
SELECT MAX(timestamp) AS latest_timestamp FROM blocks WHERE timestamp < NOW()
SELECT * FROM block_transactions
SELECT block_id, sender_address, amount FROM block_transactions
SELECT receiver_address, transaction_id FROM block_transactions ORDER BY transaction_id DESC
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_type FROM transaction_details WHERE public_key = 'abc123'
SELECT * FROM block_transactions WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM block_transactions ORDER BY block_id DESC;
SELECT block_id, sender_address, amount FROM block_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount FROM block_transactions;
SELECT block_id, sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM block_transactions WHERE sender_address = 'Alice';
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.transaction_date, b.amount FROM transaction_details t INNER JOIN block_transactions b ON t.transaction_id = b.transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM block_chain ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT wallet_address, balance FROM wallets WHERE balance < 5000;
SELECT * FROM block_chain
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT wallet_address, balance FROM wallets ORDER BY balance DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE sender_address = '0x58B5Ce59467D6c1P13A21FcBbA872648987c56BA' AND receiver_address = '0x26C8459AD49dEc89b8619e199f405feDFe13b219' AND amount = 5000

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.sender_address, t.receiver_address, t.amount, b.prev_block_id FROM cryptocurrency_transactions t JOIN block_chain b ON t.transaction_id = b.transaction_id ORDER BY b.timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM transaction_blocks;
SELECT block_id, block_hash FROM transaction_blocks ORDER BY time_stamp DESC;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT account_id, account_address FROM accounts ORDER BY account_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_blocks ORDER BY block_id DESC;
SELECT account_address, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance > 10000;
SELECT transactions FROM transaction_blocks WHERE time_stamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY time_stamp ASC;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM transactions WHERE sender_address = 'Alice' AND receiver_address = 'Bob';
SELECT block_id, block_hash FROM transaction_blocks WHERE block_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM blockchain_nodes;
SELECT first_name, last_name, username FROM user_data ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT account_id, account_balance FROM accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM account_transactions WHERE amount < 0;
SELECT block_id, timestamp, transactions FROM transaction_blocks ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_blocks ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT block_id, block_hash, COUNT(*) FROM transaction_blocks GROUP BY block_id, block_hash;
SELECT user_id, username, first_name, last_name FROM user_data WHERE username LIKE 'a%';
SELECT DISTINCT account_id FROM account_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_nodes WHERE node_address = '127.0.0.1';
